plot: This is the story of a college student, Tom Wayans, an aspiring comic artist obsessed with his art, who is dumped by his girlfriend Carla. Tom's life takes an unexpected, exciting direction...
title: My Life As a Comic
plot_es: This is the story of a college student, Tom Wayans, an aspiring comic artist obsessed with his art, who is dumped by his girlfriend Carla. Tom's life takes an unexpected, exciting direction...
